metadata.description: Buddy Baker has fought hard for our world and just as hard for his family. But by the year 2024, heroes are growing tired, the villains have grown nastier, and Buddy's own hometown of San Diego has struggled for years to recover from a cataclysmic typhoon. Now, as San Diego faces the most vicious villain it's seen in years, Buddy's powers are starting to fail him, but the hero won't fail the world. Prepare for the Last Days of Animal Man.
metadata.name: The Last Days of Animal Man
